name: ControlMyJoystick
description: Use your voice, smartphone or optional 3Dconnexion controller to send commands to your game as joystick, keyboard and mouse input. No programming knowledge required!
minimum_requirements: OS: WIndows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (32 or 64 bit) Processor: Any modern Intel or AMD 32 or 64 bit CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Minimum 1024 x 768 resolution Storage: 80 MB available space Additional Notes: Supports optional 3Dconnexion controllers
